instruction: Describe the character of a famous historical figure.
input: Famous historical figure: Martin Luther King Jr.
output: Martin Luther King Jr. was a powerful public figure and a prolific civil rights leader who was admired for his unwavering commitment and dedication to justice, equality, and peace. His courage and strength of character allowed him to stand up for his beliefs, even in the face of adversity. He provided a hopeful vision for the future and inspired people to strive for a more just and equitable world. He was a man of immense humility, intelligence, and courage, and his legacy continues to inspire countless people to pursue their goals.
